title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 341.2 - Responses to inquiries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 341.2 - Responses to inquiries

State Regulations
the requirements of subdivision 3 of section
6-c
of the Banking

Law shall apply to all written and oral inquiries, whether made in person, by
letter or by telephone. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
341.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
